not_found.not_found: Whoa 404, either we broke something or you had a typing mishap :-/

errors.not_found: Server could not find requested object

variables.title: Additional pipeline variables
variables.desc: Specify additional variables to use in your pipeline. Variables with the same name will be overwritten.
variables.name: Variable name

deploy_pipeline.title: Trigger deployment event for current pipeline #{pipelineId}

variables.title: Additional pipeline variables
variables.desc: Specify additional variables to use in your pipeline. Variables with the same name will be overwritten.
variables.name: Variable name

repo.user_none: This organization / user does not have any projects yet.
repo.not_allowed: You are not allowed to access this repository

settings.not_allowed: You are not allowed to access this repository's settings

pipeline_path.desc: Path to your pipeline config (for example {0}). Folders should end with a {1}.

allow_pr.desc: Pipelines can run on pull requests.

allow_deploy.desc: Allow deployments from successful pipelines. Only use if you trust all users with push access.

protected.desc: Every pipeline needs to be approved before being executed.

netrc_only_trusted.netrc_only_trusted: Only inject netrc credentials into trusted containers
netrc_only_trusted.desc: Only inject netrc credentials into trusted containers (recommended).

trusted.desc: Underlying pipeline containers get access to escalated capabilities (like mounting volumes).

public.desc: Every user can see your project without being logged in.

private.desc: Only you and other owners of the repository can see this project.

internal.desc: Only authenticated users of the Woodpecker instance can see this project.

cancel_prev.desc: Enable to cancel pending and running pipelines of the same event and context before starting the newly triggered one.

crons.desc: Cron jobs can be used to trigger pipelines on a regular basis.

delete.confirm:
All data will be lost after this action!!!

Do you really want to proceed?

pipeline.no_pipelines: No pipelines have been started yet.
pipeline.log_download_error: There was an error while downloading the log file
pipeline.log_delete_confirm: Do you really want to delete logs of this step?
pipeline.log_delete_error: There was an error while deleting the step logs

protected.awaits: This pipeline is awaiting approval by a maintainer!

pipeline.we_got_some_errors: Oh no, we got some errors!

debug.title: Debug
debug.no_permission: You don't have permission to access debug information.
debug.metadata_exec_desc: Download this pipeline's metadata to run it locally. This allows you to troubleshoot issues and test changes before committing them.

settings.not_allowed: You are not allowed to access this organization's settings

secrets.desc: Organization secrets can be passed to all organization's repository's pipeline steps as environmental variables.

registries.desc: Organization registry credentials can be added to use private images for all pipelines of an organization.

settings.not_allowed: You are not allowed to access server settings.

secrets.desc: Global secrets can be passed to all repository's pipeline steps as environmental variables.
secrets.warning: These secrets will be available for all users.

registries.desc: Global registry credentials can be added to use private images for all pipelines.
registries.warning: These registry credentials will be available for all users.

no_schedule.name: Disable agent
no_schedule.placeholder: Stop agent from taking new tasks

capacity.desc: The max amount of parallel pipelines executed by this agent.

custom_labels.desc: The custom labels set by the agent admin on agent startup.

agents.delete_confirm: Do you really want to delete this agent? It will not be able to connect to the server anymore.

queue.desc: Tasks waiting to be executed by agents

users.delete_confirm: Do you really want to delete this user? This will also delete all repositories owned by this user.

orgs.desc: Organizations owning repositories on this server.
orgs.delete_confirm: Do you really want to delete this organization? This will also delete all repositories owned by this organization.

repos.desc: Repositories that are or have been enabled on this server.

secrets.desc: User secrets can be passed to personal pipeline steps as environmental variables.

registries.desc: User registry credentials can be added to use private images for all personal pipelines.

cli_and_api.desc: Personal Access Token, CLI and API usage

agents.desc: Agents registered to your account repos.

secrets.desc: Secrets can be passed to individual pipeline steps as environmental variables.
secrets.name: Name
secrets.delete_confirm: Do you really want to delete this secret?

plugins.images: Available only for the following plugins
plugins.desc: List of plugin images where this secret is available. Leave empty to allow for all plugins and normal steps.

events.pr_warning: Please be careful with this option: a bad actor can submit a malicious pull request that exposes your secrets.

registries.desc: Registry credentials can be added to use private images for pipelines.
registries.none: There are no registry credentials yet.
registries.delete_confirm: Do you really want to delete this registry?

update_woodpecker: Please update your Woodpecker instance to {0}
login_to_cli_description: By continuing you will be logged into the CLI.
return_to_cli: You can now close this tab and return to the CLI.
